name: Legend of Titans: The Sky Aisle Demo
name_original: Legend of Titans: The Sky Aisle Demo
description:
With captain T-snack and his sun god plant, let's kill Prince Han and conqueror the Sky Aisle!

The indie game project was made base on Jiantao Hu’s original IP graphic novel “Legend of Titans”. The series “Legend of Titans” contains 9 relatively independent and interrelated stories. Jiantao choose one of these stories to develop this project. 

To play the game: W=Jump, A=Move to Left, D=Move to Right, Space=Attack

The application supports macOS Device. After download it, go to system preferences->Privacy& Security->unlock and click download it anyway.
